类 DefaultFileFilter.ImageFileFilter

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      gui.editor.DefaultFileFilter.ImageFileFilter
正在封闭类：
DefaultFileFilter
public static class DefaultFileFilter.ImageFileFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter

Utility file filter to accept all image formats supported by image io.

另请参见：
ImageIO.getReaderFormatNames()

构造方法摘要
Constructor and 描述
DefaultFileFilter.ImageFileFilter(java.lang.String description)
          Constructs a new file filter for all supported image formats using the specified description.
 
方法摘要
Modifier and Type Method and 描述
 boolean accept(java.io.File file)
          Returns true if the file is a directory or ends with a known image extension.

构造方法详细信息

DefaultFileFilter.ImageFileFilter

public DefaultFileFilter.ImageFileFilter(java.lang.String description)
Constructs a new file filter for all supported image formats using the specified description.

参数：
description - The description to use for the file filter.
方法详细信息

accept

public boolean accept(java.io.File file)
Returns true if the file is a directory or ends with a known image extension.

指定者：
类 javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter 中的 accept
参数：
file - The file to be checked.
返回：
Returns true if the file is accepted.
